text: Hayden Lesley Panettiere (born August 21, 1989) is an American actress, singer and a Grammy Award nominee.An interview here mentions that she turned 15 in August 2004, putting her birth in August 1989 She first appeared on TV as a baby in commercials, and had her first role at the age of four in the TV show One Life To Live. She is also well known for her work in trying to stop whaling. In January 2008, Panettiere spoke at an anti-whaling meeting in Washington D.C., and later spoke to representatives from Norway, Iceland and Japan. Ref failed test. Her brother is actor Jansen Panettiere. == Some of her acting roles == *1994–97: One Life To Live (soap opera) *1998: A Bug's Life (the voice of Dot) *2000: Remember the Titans *2001: Joe Somebody *2004: Raising Helen *2005: Racing Stripes (voice) *2006–10: Heroes *2010: Alpha and Omega (movie) (voice of Kate) *2011: Amanda Knox: Murder on Trial in Italy (as Amanda Knox) *2011: Scream 4 *2012–2018: Nashville *2014-2015: Alpha and Omega 2 (movie) (voice of Kate) == References == Category:Actors from New York (state) Category:American child actors Category:American movie actors Category:American television actors Category:American voice actors Category:Singers from New York (state) Category:1989 births Category:Living people
title: Hayden Panettiere
